label: Topics in Israeli Lit &Culture
description: Seminar covering advanced topics in Israeli literature and culture. Same as JS 454 and SAME 454. 3 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. May be repeated up to 6 undergraduate hours or 8 graduate hours in separate terms if topics vary. Prerequisite: One year of college literature or consent of instructor.
